Module edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager
Package edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.models

Class RelatedProduct

java.lang.Object
edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.models.RelatedProduct
public class RelatedProduct extends Object
Represents the relation between two values

  • Constructor Details

    • RelatedProduct

      public RelatedProduct()

    • RelatedProduct

      public RelatedProduct(Product product1, Product product2, float value)
      Constructs a RelatedProduct instance with the specified products and value.
      Parameters:
      product1 - the first product to be related.
      product2 - the second product to be related.
      value - the value associated with the relationship, must be between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either product is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - both products are the same.
      IllegalArgumentException - value out of bounds.
      IllegalArgumentException - if both products are already related.

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      public float getValue()
      Gets the value of the relation.
      Returns:
      the value of the relation.

    • getProduct1

      public Product getProduct1()
      Gets the first product of the relation.
      Returns:
      the first product of the relation.

    • getProduct2

      public Product getProduct2()
      Gets the second product of the relation.
      Returns:
      the second product of the relation.

    • setProduct1

      public void setProduct1(Product product1)
      Sets the first product of the relation with another.
      Parameters:
      product1 - the new first product.

    • setProduct2

      public void setProduct2(Product product2)
      Sets the second product of the relation with another.
      Parameters:
      product2 - the new second product.

    • getProducts

      public List<Product> getProducts()
      Returns a list of the two related products.
      Returns:
      a List containing product1 and product2.

    • getOtherProduct

      public Product getOtherProduct(Product product)
      Gets the product with whom Product p is related
      Parameters:
      product - the product which the result is related with.
      Returns:
      the product that is related with the argument product.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if product is not contained in this class, and should be.

    • contains

      public Boolean contains(Product product)
      Checks if the given product is one of the related products.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to check for relation.
      Returns:
      true if the product is either product1 or product2; false otherwise.

    • setValue

      public void setValue(float value)
      Sets the value associated with this related product.
      Parameters:
      value - the new value to set for the related products.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is not between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive).
